name: Keystates
body:
### Welcome to KeyStates

Pretty straightforward little script. Just makes checking for keydowns easier. Useful for games.

`<script src="js/keystates.js"></script>`  
`<script>`  
  `Keys.init( document ); //initialise key monitoring for the document element`  
  `console.log( Keys.isDown( 65 ) ); //alert to check if the key a (keycode 65) is being held down`  
`</script>`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
